org.hardroid.client

Class ActivityRecognitionClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hardroid.client.ActivityRecognitionClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectionApi

    public class ActivityRecognitionClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConnectionApi
    The main entry point for Activity Recognition Service integration This class is used for requesting activity updates. This method requires that Connection be connected.
